actions.shell: terminal-notifier -title "ECA Approval Required" -message "Tool approval requested: $(jq -r '."tool-name" // "Unknown tool"' <<< "$1")" || osascript -e 'display notification "Tool approval requested: '$(jq -r '."tool-name" // "Unknown tool"' <<< "$1")'" with title "ECA Approval Required"'

terminal-notifier -title "ECA Shell Command" -message "Shell command approval: $(jq -r '.args.command // "Unknown command"' <<< "$1")" || osascript -e 'display notification "Shell command approval: '$(jq -r '.args.command // "Unknown command"' <<< "$1")'" with title "ECA Shell Command"'

terminal-notifier -title "ECA File Operation" -message "File operation approval: $(jq -r '."tool-name" // "Unknown operation"' <<< "$1")" || osascript -e 'display notification "File operation approval: '$(jq -r '."tool-name" // "Unknown operation"' <<< "$1")'" with title "ECA File Operation"'
